New Records: Brandon King scored the fastest 50 in T20Is in 47 balls
Key Match Events: Shai Hope was stumped by Sam Billings off Adil Rashid
Jason Holder took 4 wickets for 7 runs
Brandon King scored 52 runs off 49 balls
Nicholas Pooran remained not out on 27 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder was awarded the Player of the Match and CRICINFO's MVP for his performance
West Indies led the 5-match series 1-0 after winning the 1st T20I
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies won by 9 wickets (with 17 balls remaining)
The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
Others: The match was a day-night (20-over match)
The umpires for the match were Gregory Brathwaite, Joel Wilson, and Leslie Reifer
